name: Pivot Token
description: Pivot claims to be the world's largest investment and communication platform for blockchains. It is dedicated to providing users with real-time cryptocurrency market data and function as a one-stop-shop for trading services. Pivot hopes to help investors better manage and invest in blockchain assets through financial technology. PVT will be used as the only token in the Pivot ecosystem; PVT will also be used as gas and pledge in the platform and partner services. Pivot will reportedly use 30% service fees and game revenue to buyback PVT. All PVT that is bought back will be burned. Pivot has received investments from the likes of Binance Labs, Huobi Eco, INBlockchain, LD Capital, and LinkVC. According to Google Play data, Pivot has a total of 3.62 million users from 232 countries.
